department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: The Devil, Probably x 10 + 1: A Studio-based Seminar
course.description: Part 1 is a weekly studio session during which participants will create 3 projects in any medium or discipline during the term. Part 2 is a screening of the film "The Devil, Probably," 1977 by Robert Bresson for 10 consecutive weeks, interrupted by the 3 project class presentations. Different readings will accompany each screening. The final screening--+1--is "The Third Generation," 1979 by Rainer Werner Fassbinder.
course.prerequisites: There are no prerequisites for the class. First year participants are encouraged to apply.
course.notes: The studio projects do not need to pertain to the Bresson/Fassbinder screenings.
